channel.title: Gemini - Bringing back Runescape in 2007!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/1071/gemiii.png[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/GeminiRSRemake?feature=mhee][img]http://c.dryicons.com/images/icon_sets/socialize_icons_set/png/64x64/youtube.png[/img][/url][url=http://twitter.com/#!/GeminiRSRemake][img]http://a.dryicons.com/images/icon_sets/socialize_icons_set/png/64x64/twitter.png[/img][/url][url=http://official-gemini.com][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/t02jqu.png[/img][/url] (Permission from TheSoul) [/center] [size=14pt][b]About The Server:[/b][/size] The RS Remake that actually makes it is finally here, and it's name is Gemini! Gemini is a Runescape Remake of the 459 revision, and will contain everything [i]up to[/i] June 22, 2007. We are very inspired in recreating old Runescape, which is an important aspect in the success of this remake. However, to make this happen, we are going to need all of the support we can get.
[size=14pt][b]Development Team:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Mod Bradley - Head Developer[/li] [li]Mod Rob - Website Developer[/li] [li]Pwncody - Forum Moderator[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]Update Log:[/b][/size]
[ul][li][url=http://official-gemini.com/forums/index.php?topic=19.0][size=10pt][b]Update Log[/b][/size][/url][/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]FAQ:[/b][/size]
[ul][li][url=http://official-gemini.com/forums/index.php?topic=22.0][size=10pt][b]Frequently Asked Questions[/b][/size][/url][/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]Media:[/b][/size]
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/gemini2007.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/geminiwelcomescreen.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/geminifightcaves.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Gemini - Bringing back Runescape in 2007!
item.dc:creator: @TheGaurd TheGaurd
item.description:
@TheGaurd wrote:

I mean… Theres so many in the source that it’d be almost easier to just use a hyperion base. I mean, at the least you’ll have to completely scratch out PJA’s combat.

Read full topic

so many of these…

@runekeepthug wrote:

Guess what? We are sorting out the bugs. ;D thank you very much.

Read full topic

item.title: Gemini - Bringing back Runescape in 2007!
item.dc:creator: @TheGaurd TheGaurd
item.description:
@TheGaurd wrote:

looks good but i mean… PJA? Nonetheless good luck. But i dont think you’ll be able to sort out all of PJA’s bugs.

Read full topic

item.title: Gemini - Bringing back Runescape in 2007!
item.dc:creator: @runekeepthug runekeepthug
item.description:
@runekeepthug wrote:

Bradley isn’t like Vault, he don’t start on something he can’t finish. ;D Goodluck man!

Read full topic

item.title: Gemini - Bringing back Runescape in 2007!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:2, topic:419669”]What base is it? And how much have you added? Name and banner looks/sounds familiar.
Not saying you leeched, just saying you probably had another server or was working on it earlier. :P[/quote]We’ve had about 3 threads up and down already due to some major things going on, so that’s why.

The base is PJA - I know what your thinking, but this is going to be done right.

Read full topic

item.title: Gemini - Bringing back Runescape in 2007!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[center]

(Permission from TheSoul)
[/center]
[size=14pt]About The Server:[/size]
The RS Remake that actually makes it is finally here, and it’s name is Gemini! Gemini is a Runescape Remake of the 459 revision, and will contain everything up to June 22, 2007. We are very inspired in recreating old Runescape, which is an important aspect in the success of this remake. However, to make this happen, we are going to need all of the support we can get.

[size=14pt]Development Team:[/size]

[ul][li]Mod Bradley - Head Developer[/li]
[li]Mod Rob - Website Developer[/li]
[li]Pwncody - Forum Moderator[/li][/ul]
